title: Donald Trump revokes Secret Service protection for former vice president Kamala Harris
description: US President Donald Trump has revoked Secret Service protection for former vice president and 2024 Democratic rival Kamala Harris.
content:
US President Donald Trump has revoked Secret Service protection for former vice president and 2024 Democratic rival Kamala Harris.
A senior adviser to the former vice president confirmed the decision to NBC News, Sky News' US partner.

title: Trent Alexander-Arnold left out of England squad for World Cup qualifiers
description: Thomas Tuchel has left Real Madrid’s Trent Alexander-Arnold out of his squad for the World Cup qualifiers against Andorra and Serbia
content:
Trent Alexander-Arnold has been left out of the England squad by Thomas Tuchel. The Real Madrid player’s omission was the most striking decision by the head coach, who has given first call-ups to Elliot Anderson and Djed Spence.

title: Dutch Grand Prix: Lando Norris fastest from Oscar Piastri in first practice
description: Lando Norris leads McLaren team-mate Oscar Piastri by 0.292 seconds in first practice at the Dutch Grand Prix.
content:

title: Court to rule on whether asylum seekers can be removed from Epping hotel

title: Bank share prices tumble after calls for tax on profits
description: A think tank says a new bank tax could raise £8bn a year, a suggestion that sent bank shares tumbling.
